ISSUE.TITLE: discuss: In the request of the `hmac-auth` plugin, remove the request header related to the plugin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description In the process of using the hmac-auth plug-in, we do not want to send the http request header related to the plug-in to the upstream service. The reasons are as follows: 1. For security, please hide these headers. 2. Follow-up logic and upstream do not need these fields. The http request headers related to the `hmac-auth` plugin are (the default plugin): ``` X-HMAC-SIGNATURE, X-HMAC-ALGORITHM, X-HMAC-SIGNED-HEADERS ``` These http request header names have default values in the plugin and can also be customized in the `conf/config.yaml` file.
